content.rendered:
Feature Description
Design King-Size Sleigh Bed and Queen-Size Sleigh Bed
Material Part X Commercial Veneers, Chesham Texture Wood, Kikkar Wood
Finish Rich Cherry
Set Includes – Sleigh Bed
– 2 Night Stands
Key Features – Adorned with moldings
– Slightly sleighed bed frame
King Bed Dimensions [6 fit Width, 6.5 fit length, 4.5fit back penal height]
Queen Bed Dimensions [5.5 fit Width, 6.5 fit length, 4.5fit back penal height]

excerpt.rendered:
Elevate the elegance of your bedroom with our exquisite king-size/queen-size sleigh bed set designs. these sets are a testament to both style and quality.

Add a stylish touch to your bedroom with this king-size sleigh  Bed set design. A rich cherry finish highlights this mahogany set.

  • Set Includes: Sleigh Bed, 2 Night Stand
  • Materials:  Part X Commercial Veneers and Chesham Texture Wood + Kikkar Wood
  • Finish: Rich Cherry
  • Adorned with moldings and is slightly sleighed

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
